main.no-internet-connection: All the features require internet connectivity.
main.please-connect-phone: Please connect your phone to the internet and try again.
account.press-description: Press the big button and start talking. Press again when done, to end the recording.
account.push-description: Press and hold the big button while talking.
account.auto-description: Press the big button to enable voice activity detection. Press again to disable it. It will be disabled automatically if idle for 2 mins.
account.pin-length: PIN must be at least 4 digits
account.pin-protection-ensures: PIN protection ensures that only you can access the core functionality of 2XL.
account.use-pin-to-verify: Use PIN to verify your identity.

account.agree-to-terms-and-privacy: I agree to <1>Privacy Policy</1>, <2>Terms of Use</2>, <3>Product End User License Agreement</3> & <4>Parent Application End User License Agreement</4>

color-scheme.choose-a-color: Choose a color mode above to change the system default appearance on the app.

login.verify-email: We have sent an email with a confirmation link to your email address.
password.too-many-requests: Access to your account has been temporarily blocked due to too many login attempts

product.please-enter-tracking-id: Please enter a valid tracking ID
pairing.activate-bluetooth: Please turn on the Bluetooth on your device
pairing.connected:
Connected!

Keep the My2XL App always open to stay connected!
history.select-a-date: Select the day you'd like to review
profile.select-categories-notifications: Select the categories you'd like to be notified about.
profile.story-description: Unleash your imagination in Story Mode! Together with 2XL, create unique, never-before-told tales featuring any characters, settings, and plots you dream up, in a completely safe and captivating environment.
profile.fun-description: Step into Fun Mode, where laughs and learning collide! Crack jokes, tackle quizzes, and play whimsical word games with 2XL, all crafted for pure enjoyment and a dash of education.
profile.conversation-description: Dive into Conversation Mode, where the fun never stops! Chat, learn languages, and explore every topic under the sun with 2XL, all in a cozy, safe space.
age-restriction.this-is-for-grownups: Uh oh! This is for grownups
age-restriction.press-the-button: To continue, solve the following equation and press the button
age-restriction.wrong-response: Wrong response will log you out
balance.title: Balance
balance.alert.title: Attention!
balance.alert.description: Your Vexels balance is running low! Without sufficient Vexels, you won't be able to access all the amazing features of our app.
balance.alert.10k: 🎉 Congratulations! You've earned a bonus 9,500 Vexels! 🎉
common.name: Name
help.new-account.message: Welcome to the wonderful world of 2XL!
help.profile.title: Setup a New Profile
help.profile.message:
Set up a profile for each person who will use 2XL.  You can customize each profile for a more personalized experience.  Now, turn on 2XL using the knob on the back of 2XL.

 This knob is also used for volume, so be sure to start 2XL with the volume knob turned up. Connect with 2XL by tapping the Connect With 2XL button.

 If 2XL gets disconnected for any reason, you can Scan Again or, if you are still having difficulty connecting, try turning 2XL off and then on, using the knob and Connecting again.

 Always remember that the 2XL mobile app needs to remain open on your device in order to stay connected to 2XL.
help.connect.title: Connect your 2XL
help.connect.message:
Turn On 2XL using the Knob on the Back of 2XL. 

 Use the dial to adjust the Speaker Volume 

 Once connected press the play button on front to Talk
help.home.title: Instruction for Home Page
help.home.message:
Set up a profile for each person who will use 2XL.  You can customize each profile for a more personalized experience.  Now, turn on 2XL using the knob on the back of 2XL. 

This knob is also used for volume, so be sure to start 2XL with the volume knob turned up. Connect with 2XL by tapping the Connect With 2XL button. 

If 2XL gets disconnected for any reason, you can Scan Again or, if you are still having difficulty connecting, try turning 2XL off and then on, using the knob and Connecting again. 

Always remember that the 2XL mobile app needs to remain open on your device in order to stay connected to 2XL.
help.talkmode.title: Talk to 2XL
help.talkmode.message:
Press the center button on 2XL to start talking 

 Go to a user’s profile: Talking Mode to change the way 2XL listens: 

 2XL Talking Modes: 

PRESS \n• Press once to talk to 2XL, press again when done talking 

PUSH TO TALK\n•Press and hold the center button while talking. 

SILENCE DETECTION \n• 2XL will be listening continuously.
help.youraccount.title: Setup a  New Account
help.youraccount.message:
Account is where you can update your various Account details, such as your account’s email address and owner name. 

Here, you can view status such as 2XL’s battery level, select the app’s default language, add a PIN for account protection, and manage other account settings.
help.history.title: Check your Chat History
help.history.message:
History is where you can review previous chats in detail. 

To view a chat history from a specific day, select the date and then select the Review button. There you will see the chat and an option to view a summary of it. 

To select a History of a different profile, tap the three dots and select an active profile.
help.yourprofile.title: Setup your Profile
help.yourprofile.message:
Set up a profile for each person who will use 2XL. 

You can customize each profile for a more personalized experience.
help.interests.title: Setup Your Interests
help.interests.message:
Selecting multiple interests for each profile helps 2XL learn more about each user.  

These interests will guide 2XL toward more personally engaging topics in conversation.  

Select as many as you’d like.  For instance, Animals.
help.moderation.title: Setup your Moderations
help.moderation.message:
Through Moderation, you can customize rules and guardrails for chat conversations. 

Encourage specific topics that you would like 2XL to touch on or discourage specific topics and words that 2XL should stay away from. 

These can be specific and personal to each user. 

By default, 2XL already has strict moderation guardrails in place for privacy and safety. 

Email notifications can be sent to you when topics and words of concern are discussed by a user, and you will be able to review the questionable conversations in detail within the app’s Alerts section.
help.customizations.title: Setup your Customizations
help.customizations.message:
Character customizations include 2XL’s spoken language options. 

2XL speaks many languages, and you can customize the default here. You can also ask 2XL how to say anything in any language anytime. 

Character Modes determine 2XL’s conversation style. Conversation is the default mode, where you can ask or talk about anything with 2XL. 

You can change to another mode, like Story, to unleash your imagination and create unique never before told tales together in a safe and captivating environment.
help.balance.title: Buy more Vexels
help.balance.message:
When 2XL runs out of Vexels, it makes it hard for him to communicate back to his mothership. 

Help 2XL stay focused and tap into his super inelligance by selecting one of many different packages of Vexels. 

Super user hint: The more Vexels, the better the price.
help.alerts.title: Check your mediation alerts
help.alerts.message:
Monitor a profile’s chat conversations in Alerts for concerning language.  

View the chat conversation and its details here.
help.moderation-topic-encouraged.title: Setup a New topic
help.moderation-topic-encouraged.message:
Want 2XL to talk about specific topics? 

Just add them here, one by one, and 2XL will happily talk about them!
help.moderation-topic-discouraged.title: Setup a New topic
help.moderation-topic-discouraged.messag:
Things you want 2XL to not discuss? 

Topics can be anything you don't want 2XL to talk about. 

He'll dance around the subjects and redirect you to items you've discussed, topics of interest or just something fun and random!
help.moderation-word.title: Setup a New word
help.moderation-word.message:
Specific words you want 2XL to not say? 

Put them here, one by one and 2XL will stay away from those words, no matter how hard you try to get him to!
help.moderation-recipient.title: Setup a Recipient
help.moderation-recipient.message:
When moderated items are discussed, adding a new recipient here will send a new email for EACH time any person mentions them! 

Oh wow, So Cool!!!
